QuestData.Title: Softening the Target
QuestData.Description: The Archdruid's end draws near. His memory will live on in the hearts of all who knew him.$b$bElothir's desperate efforts revealed that Malfurion is being held in Shala'nir, amidst the roots of Shaladrassil.$b$bMy love. So near, yet so far....$b$bShala'nir is infested with Nightmare creatures. To rush in would be suicide.$b$bI subdued one of Xavius' creatures. Use it against him, $n and clear us a path.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 50 Nightmare Creatures in Shala'nir riding the Subdued Nightwing.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you managed to thin their numbers?
QuestData.RewardText: This place remains deadly, but we can now press forward.
